dlentry.dt: I activated my license but my Evoq website still says that I am on the trial version.
dlentry.dd: See Troubleshoot: Trial message still appears after license activation.

dlentry.dt: Can I activate a license on a server without internet access?
How do I view my available licenses?
dlentry.dd: Go to Host Advanced Settings (double-gear tab) License Management, and then search for your email address or invoice number.

dlentry.dt: How do I recover a production license that was inadvertently activated in a local development environment?
How do I delete an activated development license in my local server?
dlentry.dd: While logged in as Host, go to Host Advanced Settings (double-gear tab) License Management, then delete the license from the list.
